function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of reporting pandemic-related national and local policies during data collection","Impact":"Incomplete contextual information, potential misunderstanding of the impact of the pandemic","Mitigation":"Include information on pandemic-related policies and impacts in data collection reports","Technologies":"Data collection and reporting tools, government references","People":"Researchers, data collectors","Owner":"Researchers, data collectors"},{"Description":"Failure to report significant changes in pandemic measures during data collection","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data due to lack of context on policy changes","Mitigation":"Regularly update data collection reports with changes in pandemic measures","Technologies":"Real-time data monitoring tools, communication platforms","People":"Research team, data analysts","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"},{"Description":"Incomplete representation of pandemic severity and its impacts","Impact":"Limited understanding of the overall context and effects of the pandemic","Mitigation":"Gather data on health, social, and economic impacts of the pandemic from official sources","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, government databases","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, public health officials"}]}
